tiles.title: WAD Version breakdown
LAD Version breakdown
(WAD) population count
tiles.query:
//WAD Installed or Enabled Count
cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').
WADDailySnapshot
| summarize Population = dcount(ResourceId), iaasdiagPop = dcountif(ResourceId, ExtName=~"microsoft.azure.diagnostics.iaasdiagnostics"),paasdiagPop = dcountif(ResourceId, ExtName=~"microsoft.azure.diagnostics.paasdiagnostics"),edpPop = dcountif(ResourceId, ExtName in~ ("microsoft.azure.diagnostics.edp.iaasdiagnostics", "microsoft.azure.diagnostics.edp.paasdiagnostics"))

tiles.title: (LAD) population count
tiles.query:
//LAD Installed or Enabled Count
cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').
LADDailySnapshot
| summarize Population = dcount(ResourceId)

tiles.title: (LAD/WAD) overall population count
tiles.query:
//LAD/WAD Installed or Enabled Count
union cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').
    WADDailySnapshot, cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').
    LADDailySnapshot
| summarize Population = dcount(ResourceId)

tiles.title: (LAD/WAD) active population estimate
tiles.query:
//LAD/WAD Installed or Enabled Count
union cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').
    WADDailySnapshot, cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').
    LADDailySnapshot
| where Date >= ago(60d)
| summarize DailyCount = count() by Date
| summarize MonthlyAvg = round(avg(DailyCount),0)

tiles.title: (WAD) active population estimate
tiles.query:
//WAD Installed or Enabled Count
cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').
WADDailySnapshot
| where Date >= ago(60d)
| summarize DailyCount = count() by Date
| summarize MonthlyAvg = round(avg(DailyCount), 0)

tiles.title: (LAD) active population estimate
tiles.query:
//LAD Installed or Enabled Count
cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').
LADDailySnapshot
| where Date >= ago(60d)
| summarize DailyCount = count() by Date
| summarize MonthlyAvg = round(avg(DailyCount), 0)
